session_summary: Deborah and Jolene discussed their favorite comforting dishes and ways to find time for themselves amidst studies and exams on 2nd March 2023 at 7:18 pm. They shared how activities like yoga, meditation, and spending time outdoors help them relax and reset. Jolene expressed concerns about managing stress and prioritizing self-care, while Deborah offered tips on studying, time management, and self-care. Deborah also promised to give Jolene a motivating mug and encouraged her to take care and relax.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hey Jolene, Anna got me a vegan stir-fry the other day - tofu and veg with ginger and soy sauce. It was really tasty! Food is such a wonderful source of pleasure and nourishment. What dishes are comforting to you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: One of my favorite dishes is lasagna! Comfort food can be a great pick-me-up. I've got a lot going on with my studies and exams.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Have you been able to find time for yourself lately?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a room with a wooden floor and a window
conversation_turns.text: I've been trying to squeeze in some me-time. Last Friday, I did yoga and meditation to relax. Did you find time for yourself too?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: I also did the same, it helped me reset my mind. How does it make you feel?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a purse with a plant on a table
conversation_turns.text: It's amazing how a few quiet moments can work wonders for the soul.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Have you been able to get outside lately?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a lizard laying on the ground surrounded by leaves
conversation_turns.text: I did take Seraphim to the park last Sunday. She loved it and here's a pic.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Looks like you guys had fun!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: We explored new places. People are surprised when they see a tamed snake. What do you like about being outdoors?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hmm... The birds chirping and the breeze gently blowing! It reminds me of what really matters.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Yep, it's like a reminder to slow down and appreciate the little things.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Is there anything you want to be more mindful of right now?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I need to be more mindful of my stress levels and take care of my mental health. Sometimes I get too caught up in my studies and forget to prioritize self-care.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Life can get hectic and it's easy to forget about ourselves.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a desk with a notebook and a computer monitor
conversation_turns.text: Exams and deadlines got me feeling overwhelmed. Just look at my to-do list! It seems never-ending... Trying my best but it's been challenging.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Your efforts will bear fruit, don't give up!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Deb. Any tips on studying or time management?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: My tip is to break it into smaller pieces and set goals for yourself. For time management, planners or schedulers help you stay organized and give you time for yourself. Let me know if you need help with a study plan!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I appreciate your help with that.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a yellow coffee cup with a handwritten message
conversation_turns.text: Take care and good luck with your exams. I'll give you a mug just like this one! It encourages.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Deb! This really cheered me up. All the best with your classes. Bye!

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Thanks, Jolene! Glad I could bring a smile to your face. Take care and make sure to give yourself some time to relax. Bye!
